title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. I, subch. F, pt. 84 - Transmission Facilities Management
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. I, subch. F, pt. 84 - Transmission Facilities Management

State Regulations
§ 84.1 - Aerial spraying approval
§ 84.2 - Long-range right-of-way management plan for electric transmission systems
§ 84.3 - Transmission right-of-way maintenance programs and schedules
§ 84.4 to 84.5 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. I, subch. F, pt. 84

Statutory authority: Public Service Law, §§
65[1], 66[2]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
